text: today I'm making something super fun
it's baked spaghetti I'm pretty sure
that this was originally invented to use
up already cooked spaghetti like
leftover spaghetti but today I'm making
it straight from scratch but if you
happen to have leftover spaghetti lying
around or other kinds of pastas you can
adapt the recipe to using those I just
added 12 ounces of spaghetti to salted
boiling water and you just need to cook
it till it's all dente meanwhile you can
make your sauce add some olive oil a
couple tablespoons and then two cloves
of crushed and peeled garlic when your
garlic becomes fragrant you can add two
28-ounce cans of whole peeled tomatoes
that have been either crushed or pulsed
in a food processor it can be a little
crazy when you add moisture to oil so be
careful it definitely bubbles up pretty
aggressively at least in the beginning
I'm going to add a tiny bit of salt and
some pepper then you want to cook this
bubbling pretty vigorously until it's
reduced a little bit about 12 minutes
you're going to need 2 cups of fresh
basil just whole leaves and if you want
to like I always want to you can save
some cute pieces as a garnish it's
completely optional but I like making
things pretty plus more basil is always
good at my book you'll need 12 ounces of
fresh mozzarella you can just slice it
into half-inch pieces
save half of it for the top and half
gets tossed in with your pasta and sauce
cook that's about 5 minutes less and it
says on the package you want it just a
little bit crunchy because this is going
to go into the oven
put the pasta back the pot pour your
sauce over your pasta in the pot then
add your basil
I want it cooked in there so I'm adding
it now not cooked so much is infused
then add half of that mozzarella you can
tear it into pieces if you want to for
better distribution this is going to
help bind your spaghetti pie together
mmm I'm not going to bake this I'm just
gonna stand here and let the basil waft
at me I have my oven preheating to 400
degrees this is a 3 quart baking dish
pasta mixture just goes straight in
there then put the rest of your
mozzarella cheese on top then all you
need to do is bake this until it's
golden brown and bubbling it should take
about 25 minutes spaghetti pot this is a
fun dinner and I think everybody will
agree you can't get much better than a
fun and delicious dinner let's see how
it tastes mmm so good try this tonight
you guys are going to love it I am not
kidding
you
